stats.title: Earth Covered by Oceans
stats.description: The oceans cover about 71% of the Earth's surface.

stats.title: Known Marine Species
stats.description: There are more than 230,000 known species living in the ocean.

stats.title: Average Ocean Depth
stats.description: The average depth of the oceans is 3,688 meters.

stats.title: Plastic Waste in Oceans
stats.description: An estimated 8 million tons of plastic enter the oceans annually.
